snippet: The bank reported first-quarter earnings of $2.1 billion, down 23 percent from a year ago. But earnings of $3.92 a share exceeded the $3.55 analysts had estimated.
abstract: The bank reported first-quarter earnings of $2.1 billion, down 23 percent from a year ago. But earnings of $3.92 a share exceeded the $3.55 analysts had estimated.

headline.main: Goldman Profit Falls 23%, but It Surpasses Analysts' Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Goldman Profit Falls 23%, but It Surpasses Analysts’ Forecasts
